DicomTags module¶

class DicomTags.DicomTags¶

Bases: object

DICOM Tag dictionaries with Group and Element number Anonymization tags based on Section 3.15 Appendix E of DICOM Standard Tags are either deleted or set to a dummy value based on Table E.1-1a. De-identification Action Codes

getDeleteTagArray()¶

Appends each element’s group and element value within deleteTags to nested array

Returns

appendedArray – Array of DICOM tag elements, each containing a group and element value

Return type

arr

getDummyTagArray()¶

Appends each element’s group and element value within dummyTags to nested array

Returns

appendedArray – Array of DICOM tag elements, each containing a group and element value

Return type

arr
